title: #670 | Trevor Noah Hates Freedom-Loving Americans | Ted Cruz Guests | Louder With Crowder
description: What has been your opinion of late night during the COVID-19 pandemic? Kimmel, Colbert, Meyers ... have you found any of it to be fun? Is there even a joke or a bit that stands out? The gang talks about dying with dignity, Kenyan coronavirus care packages, Brian Stelter "not being OK," Joe Biden's fondest sniffing memories, and the extra guy in the Rolling Stones. In the Meat segment, we cover the "not-ever-funny-on-accident" Trevor Noah's lockdown protest lies.
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
